section.p: You slip on a loose tile; you and it crash to the ground with a shattering clatter.
'Idiot!' hisses Luroc, as he scrambles back down.
The noise has brought some guards, and at the sight of you, they raise a hue and cry.
'Run!' he screams and races off into the shadows, leaving you pursued by half a dozen armed men. You will have to try to lose them in the night.
